languages.text: "О делах. Моя добрая Торра, чей разум не покидает холодных вершин горы заработанных ею денег, рассказывала последние новости хладного торга".
"Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."
languages.original_text: "О делах. Моя добрая Торра, чей разум не покидает холодных вершин горы заработанных ею денег, рассказывала последние новости хладного торга".

traits.locale_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."
"Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."
"Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."
"Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

languages.text: “聊生意。我亲爱的托菈一门心思扑在生意和赚钱上面，她刚刚正在和我说冷市贸易的最新消息。”
languages.original_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

traits.locale_text: “聊生意。我亲爱的托菈一门心思扑在生意和赚钱上面，她刚刚正在和我说冷市贸易的最新消息。”

languages.text: 「ビジネスさ。親愛なるトーラは、稼いだ金のことが、どうしたって頭から離れないみたいだけど、冷たき取引の最新のニュースを教えてくれた」
languages.original_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

traits.locale_text: 「ビジネスさ。親愛なるトーラは、稼いだ金のことが、どうしたって頭から離れないみたいだけど、冷たき取引の最新のニュースを教えてくれた」

languages.text: «De negocios. Mi querida Torra, que nunca deja de pensar en las gélidas cumbres de las montañas de dinero que ha amasado, me estaba dando las últimas noticias del Comercio Frío».
languages.original_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

traits.locale_text: «De negocios. Mi querida Torra, que nunca deja de pensar en las gélidas cumbres de las montañas de dinero que ha amasado, me estaba dando las últimas noticias del Comercio Frío».

languages.text: « Nous parlions affaires. Ma chère Torra, dont l'esprit ne s'aventure jamais bien loin des pics enneigés de la montagne d'argent qu'elle a amassée, me faisait part des dernières nouvelles du Commerce Froid. »
languages.original_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

traits.locale_text: « Nous parlions affaires. Ma chère Torra, dont l'esprit ne s'aventure jamais bien loin des pics enneigés de la montagne d'argent qu'elle a amassée, me faisait part des dernières nouvelles du Commerce Froid. »

languages.text: "Übers Geschäft. Meine werte Torra, deren Gedanken sich ständig um die kalten Gipfel ihrer Geldberge drehen, hat mir die neuesten Sachen vom Kalthandel erzählt."
languages.original_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

traits.locale_text: "Übers Geschäft. Meine werte Torra, deren Gedanken sich ständig um die kalten Gipfel ihrer Geldberge drehen, hat mir die neuesten Sachen vom Kalthandel erzählt."

languages.text: "İş. Aklı, kazandığı paraların meydana getirdiği dağların zirvesindeki soğuk rüzgârlardan asla uzaklaşmayan sevgili Torra, bana en güncel Soğuk Ticaret haberlerini veriyordu."
languages.original_text: "Business. My dear Torra, whose mind never strays from the chilly peaks of the mountains of money she's made, was telling me the latest Cold Trade news."

traits.locale_text: "İş. Aklı, kazandığı paraların meydana getirdiği dağların zirvesindeki soğuk rüzgârlardan asla uzaklaşmayan sevgili Torra, bana en güncel Soğuk Ticaret haberlerini veriyordu."
